summary: Building a shareable app with custom domain and social media preview features
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Social media preview card showing the Gut Punch logo with a secure shield icon and tagline 'AI-Powered Scam Detection' on a clean gradient background (social-preview.dim_1200x630.png)

existing_features.title: Add custom domain configuration interface in the Admin Dashboard that allows administrators to view instructions for setting up a custom domain (DNS CNAME records pointing to the Internet Computer canister URL) and displays the current domain status
Add Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags to the application HTML head to enable rich social media previews when sharing the app link, including title, description, and preview image
Display the shareable app URL prominently in the application interface with a copy-to-clipboard button to make sharing easier for users
